Package Server

Class CommunicationServer

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
Server.CommunicationServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class CommunicationServer
extends java.lang.Thread
this class controls the communication with the Server

  • Constructor Details

    • CommunicationServer

      public CommunicationServer​(Config config) throws java.io.IOException
      this is the constructor for this class, it creates the socket and initializes the input/output streams.
      Parameters:
      config - the configuration file that contains the port information and the address of the host
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - in case any error happened while creating the streams

    • registerUser

      public void registerUser​(User user, ServerCallbacks serverCallbacks) throws WrongFormatException, EmptyFieldException, PasswordShortException, PasswordUpperException, PasswordLowerException, PasswordSpecialException, PasswordDigitException
      this methods send a request to the server to register a new user
      Parameters:
      user - the user to be registered
      Throws:
      WrongFormatException - if the user entered an email with a wrong format
      EmptyFieldException - if the user left one of the fields empty
      PasswordShortException
      PasswordUpperException
      PasswordLowerException
      PasswordSpecialException
      PasswordDigitException

    • loginUser

      public void loginUser​(java.lang.String usernameEmail, java.lang.String password, ServerCallbacks serverCallbacks) throws EmptyCredentialsException
      This method sends a user to be verified in the server side
      Parameters:
      usernameEmail - a String that can either be the email or the username (which are two valid options to login)
      password - the password of the client
      Throws:
      EmptyCredentialsException - this exception is thrown if at least there's one of the credentials empty

    • shareSong

      public void shareSong​(Song song) throws SongWrongFormatException
      this method sends a song to the server so it can be saved in the database
      Parameters:
      song - the song to be saved
      Throws:
      SongWrongFormatException

    • sendGetSongsRequest

      public void sendGetSongsRequest()
      this method sends a request to the server to get the user's songs, the public songs and the user friend's songs.

    • playSongById

      public void playSongById​(int songId, ServerCallbacks callbacks)
      this method send a request to the server to get all the information of a song given it's id
      Parameters:
      songId - the id of the requested song
      callbacks - the class to which the information should be directed after it being received
      See Also:
      ServerCallbacks, Song

    • requestUserFriends

      public void requestUserFriends()
      this method sends a request to the server asking to get a list of all the friends of the current user.

    • requestAddFriendByCode

      public void requestAddFriendByCode​(java.lang.String friendId)
      tthis method sends a request to the server to add the specified user to the friends list of the current user
      Parameters:
      friendId - the user to be added as a friend

    • requestFriendSongsByCode

      public void requestFriendSongsByCode​(java.lang.String friendId)
      this method sends a request to the server to get all the songs of a specified friend of the current user
      Parameters:
      friendId - the id of the friend who's songs have been requested
